a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Countries that are democracies and non-democracies, World
Based on the classification and assessment by Boix et al. (2013). Democracies are understood here as political
systems in which political leaders are elected under broad rights for men to vote in free and fair elections.
Data source: OWID based on Boix et al. (2013)
